reviews.review_msg: Wonderful prof with a passion for historical linguistics. Very understanding and accommodating. He wants everyone to do well.

Took 322,323,301 with him. Extremely easy marker, assignments 20% weighed upon completion and 10% for presentation of the answers of hmk assignments relatively easy papers are straight forward. High marking scale, but still capable in getting a good mark. He enjoys class discussions and in-depth research towards class topic.

Boring, disappointing: the book mediocre, the assignments not well related to the lectures, the lectures boring as anything, the exams just memorization. Zita tries, but she's poor at answering questions in class and asks a lot of display questions. Don't be mislead: it's all just phonology anyways.
